contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Xtra-Acme USA | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Jon Spencer Blues Explosion]] | Cover = Xtra-Acme_USA.jpg | Released = September 14, 1999 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Punk blues]] | Length = 73:58 | Label = [[Matador Records]] | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album =''[[Acme (album)|Acme]]'' <br/> (1998) | This album ='''''Xtra-Acme USA''''' <br/> (1999) | Next album =''[[Acme Plus]]'' <br/> (1999) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|3.5|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r430564|}}</ref> | rev2 = [[Pitchfork Media]] | rev2Score = (7.1/10) <ref>[http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/article/record_review/18908-jon-spencer-blues-explosion-xtra-acme-usa Review at Pitchfork Media]</ref> }} '''''Xtra-Acme USA''''' is the US follow up to the album [[Acme (album)|Acme]] by the group [[Jon Spencer Blues Explosion]]. It is a collection of B-sides and remixes of songs originally appearing on the main album. This release differs slightly from the UK version called [[Acme Plus]]. Two tracks from Xtra-Acme USA are not included in [[Acme Plus]] ''(Lovin' Machine (Automator) and Calvin (Zebra Ranch))'', however the same is true for the [[Acme Plus]] album. Two of the tracks contained on it (Right Place, Wrong Time and I Wanna Make it All Right (Zebra Ranch) are not on the track listing of Xtra-Acme USA.<ref>http://www.pop-catastrophe.co.uk/uracomp.aspx</ref> ==Artwork== The album cover features actress [[Winona Ryder]], who starred in the music video for ''Talk About The Blues'', which appeared in the band's sixth studio album [[Acme_(album)|ACME]]. ==Track listing== #Wait a Minute - 3:48 #Get Down Lover - 3:47 #Confused - 3:04 #Magical Colors (31 Flavors) - 4:09 #Not Yet - 4:08 #Get Old - 1:46 #Bacon - 3:32 #Blue Green Olga [Remix] - 4:30 #Heavy [Remix] - 3:13 #Lap Dance - 3:26 #Leave Me Alone So I Can Rock Again - 5:06 #Soul Trance - 4:28 #Electricity - 2:30 #New Year - 2:58 #Lovin' Machine (Automator) - 3:39 #Chowder - 3:16 #T.A.T.B. [For the Saints and the Sinners Remix] - 7:29 #Hell - 3:25 #Calvin (Zebra Ranch) - 4:08 #[Unlisted Track/Radio Advert for Acme] - 1:36 ==UK Track listing== #Wait a Minute - 3:48 #Get Down Lover - 3:47 #Confused - 3:04 #Magical Colors (31 Flavors) - 4:09 #Not Yet - 4:08 #Get Old - 1:46 #Bacon - 3:32 #Blue Green Olga [Remix] - 4:30 #Heavy [Remix] - 3:13 #Lap Dance - 3:26 #Right Place, Wrong Time - 3:41 #Leave Me Alone So I Can Rock Again - 5:06 #Soul Trance - 4:28 #Electricity - 2:30 #New Year - 2:58 #Chowder - 3:16 #T.A.T.B. [For the Saints and the Sinners Remix] - 7:29 #Hell - 3:25 #I Wanna Make it All Right (Zebra Ranch) - 3:50 #[Unlisted Track/Radio Advert for Acme] - 1:36 ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B000XECQU0 MP3 Track Downloads at Amazon] {{The Jon Spencer Blues Explosion}} [[Category:1998 albums]] [[Category:Jon Spencer Blues Explosion albums]] [[Category:Mute Records albums]] {{1990s-punk-album-stub}}
